text: Louis Andre Jean "Jean-Louis" Vallas (2 June 1901 – 17 November 1995)Insee Social Security Death Index: Louis Andre Jean Vallas was a French poet. == References == == External links == * Site devoted to Jean-Louis Vallas Category:People from Lille Category:1901 births Category:1995 deaths Category:20th-century French poets Category:Winners of the Prix Broquette- Gonin (literature)
